reviewText:
My honest opinion on this game from the short bit I've played it is.

Pro:

- Neat
- Trippy
- good audio
- Runs smooth

Con:

- Very little as far as an actual game goes there are plenty of free versions on games exactly like this on apps stores.
- Challenging (due to controls )

Would I recommend ... No sad this is not worth even the sales price I paid of 1.97$ CAD
voteText: 14 of 21 people (67%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText: I just started and the game is not easy as it seems, there might be 2 traps at the start to pass but the game starts getting so fast that it just starts being so hard and it is a bit laggy and graphics aren't the best, but for this genre game i give it 7/10, it would get 9/10 if it had more levels and more traps, but it is a good game and i recommend it :)

reviewText:
It's a fun little cheap game. It's very addicting and fun to challenge your friends.
I would recommend this game to anyone who likes Geometry Dash and games like that.

8/10
It crashes sometimes.

reviewText: This game is good in all but the game crashes ever so often, untill then I rather wait till it has been updated and fixed more, all in all the game is fun and somewhat challenging.\n\nThe levels that crashed for me was mainly level 2 i havent gotten to 3 yet casue when i get the 100sec. it doesent register it, because it would crash like 5 seconds after reaching that mark.
